title: Inquire About Future Network Upgrades
description: A customer is asking if and when their neighborhood will be upgraded to fiber optic service.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the customer's location.

tasks.description: Check the internal network expansion roadmap for any planned upgrades in that area.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the neighborhood is scheduled for a fiber upgrade in the next 6-9 months.

tasks.description: Inform the customer of the planned upgrade timeline and offer to add them to a notification list.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the information and adds the customer to the notification list.
